ButtonSets.Name: Button Sets
ButtonSets.Hint: Internal storage for button set configurations

ConfigMenu.Name: Configure Roll for Me
ConfigMenu.Label: Configure Button Sets
ConfigMenu.Hint: Configure your custom roll button sets

Config.Title: Roll for Me Configuration
Config.Instructions: Configure your custom roll button sets
Config.InstructionsText: Create sets of buttons with GURPS OTF commands. When clicked in chat, they will execute the specified command.
Config.Label: Button Label
Config.CommandPlaceholder: Enter GURPS OTF command (e.g., 3d6, ST+2, DX-3)...

SetSelector.Title: Select Button Set
SetSelector.Instructions: Choose which button set to send to chat:

Notifications.NoButtons: No buttons configured in this set. Please configure buttons first.
Notifications.NoSets: No button sets configured. Please configure button sets first.
Notifications.NoCommand: No command specified for this button.
Notifications.GurpsNotAvailable: GURPS system not available. This module requires the GURPS game system.
